## About Dror Lahav - Jewelry Design
Dror Lahav - Jewelry Design is a business in the jewelry and diamonds industry.

## Target Audience
young men seeking engagement rings, and diverse clientele for diamond jewelry including tennis bracelets, diamond pendants, and diamond earrings
